DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion To eligible , patient must : Be male female , 1865 . Have diagnosis schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder bipolar disorder accord DSMIV criterion Have TG/HDL ratio ( > > 3.5 ) ischemic EKG change without clinical ischemia , e.g . angina Be treat minimum six month one six oral antipsychotic medication : clozapine , haloperidol , olanzapine , quetiapine , risperidone ziprasidone Be willing change current antipsychotic medication choose principal investigator Have history compliance medication Be Medicaid eligible maintain insurance cover request lab procedure Be able provide write informed consent . Exclusion criteria A patient consider ineligible he/she : Has diagnosis schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder bipolar disorder psychotic feature accord DSMIV criterion . Has history noncompliance prescribe psychiatric medication Has TG/HDL ratio < 3.5 current medication Is uninsured unable selfpay potential cost require lab procedure cover insurance .
